changelog:
Version 22.610.79 – Smarter Navigation & Better Sharing

   _This update introduces smarter ways to explore and share Sketchy Codex. With a searchable changelog, expanded resources, improved UI adjustments, and a simplified Share Options system, the app is now more intuitive, flexible, and reliable than ever._

⦁ Added:
 ▫ SearchView for the Changelog screen, enabling users to quickly find versions by name.
 ▫ New resources, including codes, components, and local libraries.

⦁ Improved:
 ▫ Adjusted app UI for a more consistent and polished look.

⦁ Updated:
 ▫ Some code snippets for improved readability and performance.
 ▫ User feedback email updated from lazyprogrammer.web@gmail.com to help.lazyprogrammer@gmail.com.

⦁ Fixed:
 ▫ BottomNavigationView now correctly moves when the drawer is opened.
 ▫ Toast messages updated to use Material style consistently across all screens.
 ▫ Font style now correctly displays in CodeView → Menu Item 2.

⦁ Removed:
 ▫ Replaced dedicated Facebook, Messenger, and Telegram share buttons with a unified Share Options feature — allowing users to choose any available app or social platform installed on their device.

⦁ Stability:
 ▫ Overall bug fixes and reliability improvements to ensure smoother app performance.
